review_blob:
Very interesting. 
Nose is slightly smokey and a little tart funky notes. Reddish pour with off white head. Light body.Tart Cherry with faintest hint of smoke, creamy tangy body. with a bittersweet finish. Not sure what i expected but exceeded expectations.

dry finish. Very nice.

Nice

Gets heavier as things proceed but a good effort nonetheless.

FIRST!

Citrus sour front. Well-rounded almost creamy body.
lingering sour finish

Very nice sour.

Hazy Dark golden Pour with shiny, creamy white head.Nose is resiny hops and the grain rice profile Creamy moiuthfeel with a slighty sticky medium body. bitter throughout. Oily finish. Unique texture makes it worth trying.
DIPAs are becoming a crowded field and its nice to try something different.

hazy golden pour with fluffy white head.

Bitter finish.
A solid well-balanced saison
